title: New: BRÍET – In Too Deep
body:
Not a Sum 41 cover, sadly.

Still a great track though. This debut single from Iceland’s **BRÍET** is about as smooth as they come. Silky, R&B inspired pop at its very best, _In Too Deep_ reminds me a little of moments from SZA’s Ctrl merged with the more haunting, sultriness of BANKS. Check it out below.

Silky, R&B inspired pop at its very best, In Too Deep reminds me a little of moments from SZA’s Ctrl merged with the more haunting, sultriness of BANKS. Check it out below.
